message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $8,000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer. However, $12,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay up to $6,000 for it.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more than $6,000 to you. Considering your interest in the product, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $9,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you and the benefits it will bring to your business.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. However, $9,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending.  I could go up to $7,000, but that's my limit.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're willing to go up to $7,000, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. Considering our previous discussions, I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $8,500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.
